dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT glog_util.remove_domain(:P_COMMODITY_GID) || ' - ' || (SELECT itm.description FROM packaged_item pi INNER JOIN item itm ON pi.item_gid = itm.item_gid WHERE packaged_item_gid = :P_COMMODITY_GID) commodity, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),'MM/DD/YYYY') day1, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),1),'MM/DD/YYYY') day2, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),2),'MM/DD/YYYY') day3, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),3),'MM/DD/YYYY') day4, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),4),'MM/DD/YYYY') day5, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),5),'MM/DD/YYYY') day6, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),6),'MM/DD/YYYY') day7, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),7),'MM/DD/YYYY') day8, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),8),'MM/DD/YYYY') day9, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),9),'MM/DD/YYYY') day10, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),10),'MM/DD/YYYY') day11, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),11),'MM/DD/YYYY') day12 FROM DUAL

SELECT SUM(b.hinv1) hinv1, SUM(b.hinv2) hinv2, SUM(b.hinv3) hinv3, SUM(b.hinv4) hinv4, SUM(b.hinv5) hinv5, SUM(b.hinv6) hinv6, SUM(b.hinv7) hinv7, SUM(b.hinv8) hinv8, SUM(b.hinv9) hinv9, SUM(b.hinv10) hinv10, SUM(b.hinv11) hinv11, SUM(b.hinv12) hinv12 FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv1, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),1),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv2, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),2),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv3, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),3),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv4, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),4),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv5, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),5),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv6, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),6),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv7, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),7),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv8, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),8),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv9, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),10),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv11, (CASE WHEN a.inventory_date = TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(ADD_MONTHS((LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1),-1),11),'DD-MM-RR') THEN a.balance ELSE 0 END) hinv12 FROM (SELECT inventory_date, balance FROM glogowner.xxscou_fi_inventory_monthly WHERE insert_date = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'DD-MM-RR') AND insert_user = :P_GL_USER AND commodity = :P_COMMODITY_GID AND warehouse = 'SCOULAR.HALLPIST') a) b
